casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Larry McLeod PULLEY. No. 42P04-7. Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 15, 2016. Larry McLeod Pulley, for Larry McLeod Pulley. Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State of NC. Vernon K. Stewart, District Attorney, for State of NC.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the application filed by Defendant on the 14th of April 2016 in this matter for Writ of Habeas Corpus, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court, Lee County:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 15th of April 2016."
